headline.print_headline: Solano's 3-Run Homer Helps Marlins Beat Rays 5-4
headline.main: Solano's 3-Run Homer Helps Marlins Beat Rays 5-4

lead_paragraph: Donovan Solano hit a three-run homer off David Price to help the Miami Marlins beat Tampa Bay 5-3 on Wednesday night, extending the Rays' longest losing streak in nearly five years to nine games. It is the second-longest losing streak in the major leagues this season.
